title: Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game (Build B150315)
description:
Fixes:

    Fixed fullscreen Alt-Tab issues
    Fixed mouse UI offset bug
    Indirectly fixed one of the start-up crashes
    Fixed body selection filter functionality, it now works as youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d expect: Upon clicking an icon, all other icons in the same category are deselected. Clicking the same icon again re-selects all icons in the section. Right-clicking does the same but doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t toggle all icons on/off.
    Fixed Ã¢â‚¬Å“flow, manual testing benchÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ showing in manual testing mode
    Made tutorial subtitles area wider to stop them from cutting off

    Fixed graph rendering bug switching between wheels and brakes tab
    Added emissions tool-tip to head & valves and fixed its coloring
    Temp fixed spray sound issue by removing it
    Centered live data & track stats buttons
    Fixed timeline highlighting not working correctly
    Fixed Lua error when changing from mid engine to front engine bodies
    Fixed an issue if you tried to load a car where that engine variant had been deleted
    Fixed economy stat in side-panel colouring wrong way
    Fixed issue with 10Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s swoopy sedan having too high center of gravity
